Question
========
Car batteries are rated in "amp-hours". This is a measure of their

Answerlist
----------
* electric charge
* current
* emf
* power
* energy capacity
* energy density

Solution
========
The amp-hour comes from multiplying current and time and is therefore a unit of electric charge.
